title: Refining grains and optimizing grain boundaries by Al2Yb to enable a dendrite-free lithium anode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00411F, Paper
Yunlong Deng, Jian Gao, Ming Wang, Jinxiang Deng, Yicheng Zhou, Wei Sun
The stripping/plating behavior of the lithium metal anode was successfully improved, resulting in the improvement of the electrochemical cycling stability and rate performance.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
